TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CloseReason extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the reason that a form was closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events are raised when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is closed, either through user action or programmatically. Handlers for these events receive parameters of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs>, respectively. Both of these event argument classes use the CloseReason enumeration.
